Billing Agreements: PayPal Express Checkout lets you give customers access to financing through PayPal Credit® - at no additional cost to you. You get paid up front, even though customers have more time to pay. A pre-integrated payment button lets customers pay quickly with PayPal Credit®. Learn More
Accordi di fatturazione: PayPal Express Checkout lets you give customers access to financing through PayPal Credit® - at no additional cost to you. You get paid up front, even though customers have more time to pay. A pre-integrated payment button lets customers pay quickly with PayPal Credit®. Learn More

Billing Agreements:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.
Accordi di fatturazione:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.

Accordi di fatturazione: Se questa opzione è attivata, il cliente può cambiare indirizzo di spedizione e metodo di spedizione sul sito web PayPal. In modalità live funziona solo via protocollo HTTPS.

Billing Agreements: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.
Accordi di fatturazione: Nota che PayPal può gestire fino a 10 opzioni di spedizione. Ecco perché Magento trasferirà solo le prime 10 opzioni di spedizione più economiche se ci sono più di 10 opzioni disponibili.

Billing Agreements: Ability for buyer to purchase without PayPal account.
Accordi di fatturazione: Possibilità per l'acquirente di acquistare senza conto PayPal.
Richiede l'indirizzo di fatturazione del cliente

Billing Agreements: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.
Accordi di fatturazione: Questa funzionalità deve essere abilitata prima di tutto nell'account venditore tramite supporto tecnico PayPal.

Billing Agreements: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
Accordi di fatturazione: Crea un accordo di fatturazione, se non c'è nessun accordo di fatturazione attivo disponibile.

Billing Agreements: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.
Accordi di fatturazione: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.

Billing Agreements: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.
Accordi di fatturazione: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.
Consenti nella creazione guidata accordo di fatturazione
Hostname endpoint o indirizzo IP personalizzato

Billing Agreements: Use colon to specify port. For example: "test.example.com:5224".
Accordi di fatturazione: Usa i due punti per specificare la porta. Per esempio: "test.esempio.com:5224".
PayPal conserva i report per 45 giorni.

Billing Agreements: Displays on catalog pages and homepage.
Accordi di fatturazione: Mostra sulla homepage e nelle pagine del catalogo.

Billing Agreements: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).
Accordi di fatturazione: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).

Billing Agreements: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.
Accordi di fatturazione: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

Billing Agreements: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.
Accordi di fatturazione: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.
perimetro di 2 pixel attorno allo spazio dell'header.

Billing Agreements: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.
Accordi di fatturazione: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.

Billing Agreements: Accept payments with a PCI-compliant checkout that keeps customers on your site. (<u>Includes Express Checkout</u>)
Accordi di fatturazione: Accetta pagamenti con un checkout conforme PCI-conforme che mantiene i clienti sul tuo sito. (<u>Include Express Checkout</u>)

Billing Agreements: PayPal recommends that you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com
Accordi di fatturazione: PayPal consiglia di impostare un altro utente sul vostro conto presso manager.paypal.com

Billing Agreements: PayPal recommends you set up an additional User on your account at manager.paypal.com, instead of entering your admin username and password here. This will enhance your security and prevent service interruptions if you later change your password. If you do not want to set up an additional User, you can re-enter your Merchant Login here.
Accordi di fatturazione: PayPal consiglia di impostare un altro utente sul vostro conto presso manager.paypal.com, invece di inserire username e password amministrativa qui. Questo migliorerà la sicurezza e preverrà interruzioni di servizio se cambierai la password in seguito. Se non vuoi impostare un utente aggiuntivo, inserisci nuovamente il login venditore qui.

Billing Agreements:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. Use PayPal’s free banner ads that let you advertise PayPal Credit® financing as a payment option when your customers check out with PayPal. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.
Accordi di fatturazione:
Why Advertise Financing?
Give your sales a boost when you advertise financing.
PayPal helps turn browsers into buyers with financing from PayPal Credit®. Your customers have more time to pay, while you get paid up front – at no additional cost to you. The PayPal Advertising Program has been shown to generate additional purchases as well as increase consumer's average purchase sizes by 15% or more. See Details.
